content: **materials list** north - patons classic merino wool 100% wool 223 yards / 204 meters per 100 grams / 3 5 oz old gold #204 paprika #238 burgundy #208 leaf green #240 1 skein of each - k hook / 6 5 mm - yarn needle - zippered pillowcase or a regular pillowcase and strong rubber band - 1/2 cup baking sod - dish soap just a squirt - old jeans and/or tennis shoes - a top-loading clothes washer - four old towels south - lily sugar n cream 100% cotton 120 yards / 110 meters per 70 9 grams/2 5 oz ecru #4 warm brown #1130 hot green #1712 rose pink #46 1 ball of each - h hook / 5 0 mm - yarn needle **finished size** north 90 /228 cm before felting 78 /198 cm after felting your scarf may be a little longer or shorter depending on your washer and the duration of felting time <u>south </u> 81 /206 cm
